tachyon.worker.block.io

Interface BlockReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalFileBlockReader

    public interface BlockReader
extends Closeable
    A reader interface to access the data of a block stored in managed storage.

    This class does not provide thread-safety.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReadableByteChannel getChannel()
      Returns a readable byte channel of the block.
      long getLength()
      Gets the length of the block in bytes.
      ByteBuffer read(long offset, long length)
      Reads data from the block.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • read

        ByteBuffer read(long offset,
              long length)
                throws IOException
        Reads data from the block.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset from starting of the block file in bytes
        length - the length of data to read in bytes, -1 for the rest of the block
        Returns:
        ByteBuffer the data that was read
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails

      • getLength

        long getLength()
        Gets the length of the block in bytes.
        Returns:
        the length of the block in bytes

      • getChannel

        ReadableByteChannel getChannel()
        Returns a readable byte channel of the block.
        Returns:
        channel
